description: Brec Boyd and Marko Lebeau are lurking in the reflection, breathing heavy in the corner of the gym and helping themselves to the eye feast that is Cody Cummings' chiseled naked body. Their leering stares from across the room pierce the air and cut the tension, but Cody is on a mission of his own. Working his perfect dick into a rock hard shaft, Cody finally gravitates a little closer to Brec and Marko, and to their credit, they are not slowing down to wait for Cody. They are content to fuck and suck each other while watching Cody do his thing, and he is content to do his thing while watching them fuck and suck each other. Guess you could say they are a reflection of each other in more ways than one.Enjoy!
title: The Men In The Mirror
